metadata.description: Plugins for Affinity CRM - Python SDK, CLI, and MCP integrations

plugins.name: affinity-sdk
plugins.description: Python SDK for Affinity CRM - typed IDs, async support, pagination patterns for developers

plugins.name: xaffinity-cli
plugins.description: Command-line interface for Affinity CRM - search, export, filter CRM data via xaffinity commands

plugins.name: xaffinity-mcp
plugins.description: MCP server for Affinity CRM - workflow tools, relationship intelligence, pipeline management
